name: Rab Alpine Bivy
description: This minimalist bivy excels in cold, alpine environments. The simple design packs down small to take up little room in your pack. Fully waterproof construction shelters from the elements and the larger interior provides you with plenty of space for a good night's sleep before your summit push.3-layer DVStorm fabric upper with eVent waterproof laminate is breathable and weatherproof.Durable nylon bathtub floor.Zippered opening with weatherproof storm flap.
